com.yahoo.labs.samoa.instances

Class InstancesHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.instances.Instances
      • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.instances.InstancesHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class InstancesHeader
extends Instances
    Class for storing the header or context of a data stream. It allows to know the number of attributes and classes.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
